title: 服务器里没有说话权限和地皮没有权限
author: 啦啦啦答

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
不能说话的话给nobreak.speak权限
地皮给plotme.use
plotme.use.add
plotme.use.remove
这三个使用权限
plotme.limit.x 限制玩家领取数量X为最大数量权限

replies.author: Ir.Nep
replies.txt_content:
nobreak插件的话，给玩家所有权限就是/mangaddp builder nobreak.all
如果我想给builder权限组在矿物世界的破坏、说话权限就是/mangaddp builder nobreak.all.kwsj   [只是个例子]
说话就是mangaddp builder nobreak.speak.世界名

推荐指令顺序：/mangaddp builder nobreak.all
/mangaddp builder -nobreak.break.不想给玩家破坏权限但给说话权限的世界

地皮楼上已回答
指令就是/mangaddp builder plotme.use
/mangaddp builder plotme.use.add
/mangaddp builder plotme.limit.X[多少块]

replies.author: 背着书包丶
replies.txt_content:
权限的问题
/mangaddp builder plotme.use
/mangaddp builder plotme.limit.x【x代表1个玩家最大能有几块地皮】
